sections.text:
81-1354.01.Employee rights; not restricted.

Nothing in sections 81-1301 to 81-1354 shall prohibit state employees from exercising their rights granted in Chapter 48, article 8, or any other applicable sections of law.

SourceLaws 1987, LB 491, ยง 11.
